name: Charles GARRISON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Garrisonv. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Charles GARRISON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of July, 2006, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Charles GARRISON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 77 MAP 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 27, 2006.
